summary: Both REQ-1 and REQ-2 are fully implemented. UpiPaymentStep.tsx now includes RAJAT50 (50%) and MATHS30 (30%) in the VALID_DISCOUNT_CODES map alongside SAVE10 and SUMMER20, and DiscountCodeManager.tsx shows all four codes in the BUILTIN_CODES admin panel. No missing requirements or hallucinated features were detected.
